verses.verse: הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold עַבְדִּי֙ <S%H5650><s%> Behold my servant אֶתְמָךְ־ <S%H8551><s%> whom I uphold בּ֔וֹ בְּחִירִ֖י <S%H972><s%> mine elect רָצְתָ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> delighteth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> [in whom] my soul נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have put רוּחִי֙ <S%H7307><s%> my spirit עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment לַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> to the Gentiles יוֹצִֽיא׃ <S%H3318><s%> upon him he shall bring forth

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִצְעַ֖ק <S%H6817><s%> He shall not cry וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> nor lift up וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַשְׁמִ֥יעַ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard בַּח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> in the street קוֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> nor cause his voice

קָנֶ֤ה <S%H7070><s%> reed רָצוּץ֙ <S%H7533><s%> A bruised לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יִשְׁבּ֔וֹר <S%H7665><s%> shall he not break וּפִשְׁתָּ֥ה <S%H6594><s%> flax כֵהָ֖ה <S%H3544><s%> and the smoking לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יְכַבֶּ֑נָּה <S%H3518><s%> shall he not quench לֶאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> unto truth יוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> he shall bring forth מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִכְהֶה֙ <S%H3543><s%> He shall not fail וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יָר֔וּץ <S%H7533><s%> nor be discouraged עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> till he have set בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּלְתוֹרָת֖וֹ <S%H8451><s%> for his law אִיִּ֥ים <S%H339><s%> and the isles יְיַחֵֽילוּ׃ <S%H3176><s%> shall wait פ

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith הָאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H410><s%> God יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בּוֹרֵ֤א <S%H1254><s%> he that created הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וְנ֣וֹטֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5186><s%> and stretched them out רֹקַ֥ע <S%H7554><s%> he that spread forth הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְצֶאֱצָאֶ֑יהָ <S%H6631><s%> and that which cometh out נֹתֵ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> of it he that giveth נְשָׁמָה֙ <S%H5397><s%> breath לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> on וְר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> upon it and spirit לַהֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> to them that walk בָּֽהּ׃

אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD קְרָאתִ֥יךָֽ <S%H7121><s%> have called בְצֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> thee in righteousness וְאַחְזֵ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> and will hold בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וְאֶצָּרְךָ֗ <S%H5341><s%> and will keep וְאֶתֶּנְךָ֛ <S%H5414><s%> thee and give לִבְרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> thee for a covenant עָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> for a light גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles

לִפְקֹ֖חַ <S%H6491><s%> To open עֵינַ֣יִם <S%H5869><s%> eyes עִוְר֑וֹת <S%H5787><s%> the blind לְהוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> to bring out מִמַּסְגֵּר֙ <S%H4525><s%> from the prison אַסִּ֔יר <S%H616><s%> the prisoners מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house כֶּ֖לֶא <S%H3608><s%> out of the prison יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> [and] them that sit חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> in darkness

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> that שְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> that [is] my name וּכְבוֹדִי֙ <S%H3519><s%> and my glory לְאַחֵ֣ר <S%H312><s%> to another לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֶתֵּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> will I not give וּתְהִלָּתִ֖י <S%H8416><s%> neither my praise לַפְּסִילִֽים׃ <S%H6456><s%> to graven images

הָרִֽאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <S%H7223><s%> Behold the former things הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come to pass וַֽחֲדָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H2319><s%> and new things אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I מַגִּ֔יד <S%H5046><s%> do I declare בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before תִּצְמַ֖חְנָה <S%H6779><s%> before they spring forth אַשְׁמִ֥יע <S%H8085><s%> I tell אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> פ

שִׁ֤ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> song חָדָ֔שׁ <S%H2319><s%> a new תְּהִלָּת֖וֹ <S%H8416><s%> [and] his praise מִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> from the end הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יוֹרְדֵ֤י <S%H3381><s%> ye that go down הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> to the sea וּמְלֹא֔וֹ <S%H4393><s%> and all that is therein אִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> the isles וְיֹשְׁבֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants

יִשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> thereof lift up מִדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> Let the wilderness וְעָרָ֔יו <S%H5892><s%> and the cities חֲצֵרִ֖ים <S%H2691><s%> [their voice] the villages תֵּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> doth inhabit קֵדָ֑ר <S%H6938><s%> [that] Kedar יָרֹ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H7442><s%> sing יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> let the inhabitants סֶ֔לַע <S%H5554><s%> rock מֵרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> from the top הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains יִצְוָֽחוּ׃ <S%H6681><s%> let them shout

יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Let them give לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory וּתְהִלָּת֖וֹ <S%H8416><s%> his praise בָּאִיִּ֥ים <S%H339><s%> in the islands יַגִּֽידוּ׃ <S%H5046><s%> and declare

יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD כַּגִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> as a mighty man יֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth כְּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> like a man מִלְחָמ֖וֹת <S%H4421><s%> of war יָעִ֣יר <S%H5782><s%> he shall stir up קִנְאָ֑ה <S%H7068><s%> jealousy יָרִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H7321><s%> he shall cry אַף־ <S%H637><s%> yes יַצְרִ֔יחַ <S%H6873><s%> yea roar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֹיְבָ֖יו <S%H341><s%> against his enemies יִתְגַּבָּֽר׃ <S%H1396><s%> he shall prevail ס

הֶחֱשֵׁ֙יתִי֙ <S%H2814><s%> holden my peace מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> I have long time אַחֲרִ֖ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> I have been still אֶתְאַפָּ֑ק <S%H662><s%> [and] refrained כַּיּוֹלֵדָ֣ה <S%H3205><s%> like a travailing woman אֶפְעֶ֔ה <S%H6463><s%> myself [now] will I cry אֶשֹּׁ֥ם <S%H5395><s%> gasp וְאֶשְׁאַ֖ף <S%H7602><s%> and devour יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> at once

אַחֲרִ֤יב <S%H2717><s%> I will make waste הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> mountains וּגְבָע֔וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and hills וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֶשְׂבָּ֖ם <S%H6212><s%> all their herbs אוֹבִ֑ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> and dry up וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> and I will make נְהָרוֹת֙ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers לָֽאִיִּ֔ים <S%H339><s%> islands וַאֲגַמִּ֖ים <S%H98><s%> the pools אוֹבִֽישׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> and I will dry up

וְהוֹלַכְתִּ֣י <S%H1980><s%> will lead עִוְרִ֗ים <S%H5787><s%> the blind בְּדֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> by a way לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָ֔עוּ <S%H3045><s%> [that] they knew בִּנְתִיב֥וֹת <S%H5410><s%> them in paths לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> [that] they have not known אַדְרִיכֵ֑ם <S%H1869><s%> not I will lead אָשִׂים֩ <S%H7760><s%> I will make מַחְשָׁ֨ךְ <S%H4285><s%> darkness לִפְנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H6440><s%> before לָא֗וֹר <S%H216><s%> light וּמַֽעֲקַשִּׁים֙ <S%H4625><s%> them and crooked things לְמִישׁ֔וֹר <S%H4334><s%> straight אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> These things עֲשִׂיתִ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> will I do וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and I will not עֲזַבְתִּֽים׃ <S%H5800><s%> unto them and not forsake

נָסֹ֤גוּ <S%H5472><s%> They shall be turned אָחוֹר֙ <S%H268><s%> back יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ashamed בֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> they shall be greatly הַבֹּטְחִ֖ים <S%H982><s%> that trust בַּפָּ֑סֶל <S%H6459><s%> in graven images הָאֹמְרִ֥ים <S%H559><s%> that say לְמַסֵּכָ֖ה <S%H4541><s%> to the molten images אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> You אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> Ye [are] our gods ס
הַחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <S%H2795><s%> ye deaf שְׁמָ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear וְהַעִוְרִ֖ים <S%H5787><s%> ye blind הַבִּ֥יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> and look לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> that ye may see

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who עִוֵּר֙ <S%H5787><s%> Who [is] blind כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> my servant וְחֵרֵ֖שׁ <S%H2795><s%> deaf כְּמַלְאָכִ֣י <S%H4397><s%> as my messenger אֶשְׁלָ֑ח <S%H7971><s%> [that] I sent מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who עִוֵּר֙ <S%H5787><s%> ? who [is] blind כִּמְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> as [he that is] perfect וְעִוֵּ֖ר <S%H5787><s%> and blind כְּעֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> as the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD'S

[רָאִיתָ כ] (רָאֹ֥ות <S%H7200><s%> advise self ק) רַבּ֖וֹת <S%H7227><s%> many things וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> none תִשְׁמֹ֑ר <S%H8104><s%> but thou observest פָּק֥וֹחַ <S%H6491><s%> not opening אָזְנַ֖יִם <S%H241><s%> the ears וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> none יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> but he heareth

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD חָפֵ֖ץ <S%H2654><s%> is well pleased לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake צִדְק֑וֹ <S%H6664><s%> for his righteousness' יַגְדִּ֥יל <S%H1431><s%> sake he will magnify תּוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> the law וְיַאְדִּֽיר׃ <S%H142><s%> and make [it] honourable

וְהוּא֮ <S%H1931><s%> this עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> But this [is] a people בָּז֣וּז <S%H962><s%> robbed וְשָׁסוּי֒ <S%H8154><s%> and spoiled הָפֵ֤חַ <S%H6351><s%> [they are] all of them snared בַּֽחוּרִים֙ <S%H2352><s%> caves כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> All וּבְבָתֵּ֥י <S%H1004><s%> houses כְלָאִ֖ים <S%H3608><s%> in prison הָחְבָּ֑אוּ <S%H2244><s%> and they are hid הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become לָבַז֙ <S%H957><s%> they are for a prey וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> none מַצִּ֔יל <S%H5337><s%> and none delivereth מְשִׁסָּ֖ה <S%H4933><s%> for a spoil וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> none אֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and none saith הָשַֽׁב׃ <S%H7725><s%> Restore

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who בָכֶ֖ם יַאֲזִ֣ין <S%H238><s%> Who among you will give ear זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise יַקְשִׁ֥ב <S%H7181><s%> to this? [who] will hearken וְיִשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> after

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> Who gave [לִמְשֹׁוסֶה כ] (לִמְשִׁסָּ֧ה <S%H4882><s%> spoil ק) יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel לְבֹזְזִ֖ים <S%H962><s%> to the robbers הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God ז֚וּ <S%H2098><s%> he against whom חָטָ֣אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> we have sinned ל֔וֹ וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not אָב֤וּ <S%H14><s%> ? for they would בִדְרָכָיו֙ <S%H1870><s%> in his ways הָל֔וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> not walk וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> were they שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> neither were they obedient בְּתוֹרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8451><s%> unto his law

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> Therefore he hath poured עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> on חֵמָ֣ה <S%H2534><s%> upon him the fury אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> of his anger וֶעֱז֖וּז <S%H5807><s%> and the strength מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of battle וַתְּלַהֲטֵ֤הוּ <S%H3857><s%> and it hath set him on fire מִסָּבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> round about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יָדָ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> yet he knew וַתִּבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> not and it burned בּ֖וֹ וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> him yet he laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> not לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> [it] not to heart פ
